item.title: Curl: PUT a File using HTTP Basic Auth
item.description: There is a myriad of ways how a file can be PUT to a RESTful webservice. If you need to send one using HTTP basic authentication, here is one way to do this using curl: curl -u "username:password" -X PUT -H "Content-Type: text/xml" -d "@filepath" https://example.com/api/v1/putreceiver Explanation of commands: # sets the username and pass for HTTP basic auth -u "username:password" # specifies the HTTP verb which we will use as the request type -X PUT # adds extra header for content type -H "Content-Type: text/xml" # attaches the file -d "@filepath" # address of the webservice https://example.
